channel.title: Web Components from Space
channel.description: Experiments with Web Components and emerging technology

item.title: Record your Canvas with Web Components
item.description: A Web Component based Canvas wrapper that can record to MP4 video

item.title: Season 1 of Web Components in Space
item.description: All 5 episodes from the first season of Web Components in Space

item.title: Season 1 Episode 4
item.description: In this episode we chat with Cassondra Roberts about Web Component style, make some web music demos, and then integrate them into an application

item.title: Season 1 Episode 5
item.description: In this episode we chat with Christian Cantrell from Stability.ai, and make a Chrome plugin to take accessibility text from images on website and use that to create AI generated images.

item.title: Season 1 Episode 3
item.description: Ben chats with Jason Mayes from Google about TensorFlow.js and then we make a pose recording application

item.title: Season 1 Episode 2
item.description: Ben chats with Merl about his shader-doodle project and we build an application that exports shaders as GIFs

item.title: Season 1 Episode 1
item.description: Ben chats with Dmitry Baranovskiy about his code to make halftone patterns out of images and then we build an app ourselves
